name: Refrigerator Repair
description: There is never a convenient time to deal with a broken refrigerator. If you notice excessive frost build-up, a leaky hose, or another problem

name: Dishwasher Repair
description: When your dishes are consistently cloudy or still dirty after a cycle, you may need dishwasher repair or service. I can help prevent ineffective wash cycles and damaging leaks!

name: Microwave Oven Repair
description: Problems you might experience with your microwave oven include sparks inside the microwave and a damaged turntable. I will fix that for you!

name: Oven, Stove, & Range Repair
description: Issues with these appliances can include burners that are not turning on, failure to heat to the right temperature, and a damaged self-cleaning function. Notice any issues? Schedule an appointment.

name: Ice Maker Repair
description: Common issues associated with ice makers or machines are clogged water filters and slow cube production. I can fix those issues and other ice maker problems.The good news is I am here to help.

name: Kitchen Exhaust Fan Repair
description: Incorrect range hood configuration and size may lead to issues. If you notice poor kitchen exhaust fan performance or strange noises coming from the vent hood fan motor, give me a call.
